SEARCH
Package controller

Class AddToy

java.lang.Object
controller.AddToy
public class AddToy extends Object
The AddToy class represents the functionality to add a new toy to the ToyList. It provides the user with prompts to fill out a type of toy.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddToy

      public AddToy(ToyList toyList)
      Constructs an AddToy object with the given ToyList.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • launchAdd

      public void launchAdd() throws IOException, NegativePriceException, InvalidPlayerRangeException
      Launches the Add Toy menu and prompts the user for information about the new toy. Creates a new toy object based on the input and adds it to the ToyList.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      NegativePriceException - if the price of the toy is negative.
      InvalidPlayerRangeException - if the player range of the toy is invalid.

    • search

      private void search() throws IOException, NegativePriceException, InvalidPlayerRangeException
      Prompts the user for the serial number of the new toy and checks if it is unique in the ToyList. If the serial number is unique, it prompts the user for information about the toy and creates a new toy object. If the serial number is not unique, it prompts the user to enter a different serial number.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      NegativePriceException - if the price of the toy is negative.
      InvalidPlayerRangeException - if the player range of the toy is invalid.

    • validatePrice

      private void validatePrice(String tprice) throws NegativePriceException
      Validates if the price of the toy is negative.
      Parameters:
      tprice - the price of the toy.
      Throws:
      NegativePriceException - if the price is negative.

    • uniqueSN

      private boolean uniqueSN(String sn)
      Checks if a toy with the given serial number already exists in the toy list.
      Parameters:
      sn - the serial number of the toy to check.
      Returns:
      true if no toy with the given serial number exists, false otherwise.
